title: Getting Into Google Summer Of Code 2026
summary: Learn how to get started with Google Summer of Code 2026 and kickstart your open source journey
details: An info session covering everything you need to know about applying for GSoC 2026, including selecting projects, writing proposals, and getting selected.

title: Machine Learning Isn't as Hard as You Think: Kickstart Your ML Journey the Right Way
summary: Get started with Machine Learning fundamentals and learn the right approach to begin your ML journey
details: A comprehensive workshop covering ML basics, practical approaches, and hands-on exercises to help you understand machine learning concepts.

title: 5 Day Full Stack Bootcamp
summary: Intensive 5-day bootcamp covering full stack development from frontend to backend
details: Learn modern web development with hands-on projects. Covers React, Node.js, databases, and deployment. Over 165 participants attended!

title: A Technical Walkthrough of GenAI: Exploring The Behind the Scenes
summary: Deep dive into Generative AI technology and understand how it works behind the scenes
details: Technical session exploring the architecture, training, and deployment of Generative AI models with practical demonstrations.

title: Step into the Metaverse: Your First WebXR Workshop
summary: Build immersive web experiences with WebXR and explore the metaverse
details: Hands-on workshop on creating virtual and augmented reality experiences using WebXR technologies.

title: Think IoT
summary: Explore the Internet of Things and learn how to build connected devices
details: Workshop on IoT fundamentals, sensor integration, and building smart connected systems.

title: Boost Your Productivity: Exploring New AI Tools
summary: Discover and learn to use the latest AI tools to boost your productivity
details: Conference session covering various AI productivity tools, automation techniques, and best practices.

title: WebX Trivia
summary: Fun and competitive web technology trivia challenge
details: Test your web development knowledge in this exciting trivia competition with 285 participants!

title: Build with AI - GenAI Workshop
summary: Hands-on workshop on building applications with Generative AI
details: Practical workshop where participants learned to build AI-powered applications. Full participation of 115 attendees!

title: Tech Winter Break Chennai Institute Of Technology
summary: End of year tech talks and knowledge sharing session
details: Speaker session featuring tech talks and discussions to wrap up the year with learning.

title: Cyber Security Workshop
summary: Learn essential cybersecurity concepts and best practices
details: Comprehensive workshop on cybersecurity fundamentals, threat detection, and security best practices.

title: Importance of GenAI
summary: Understanding the significance and impact of Generative AI in modern technology
details: Workshop discussing the importance, applications, and future of Generative AI technology.

title: Introduction To Community - GDG On Campus Chennai Institute Of Technology
summary: Welcome session introducing students to the GDG on Campus community
details: Official introduction session for new members to learn about GDG, community activities, and opportunities.
